name: lancenslindy
0:
”Alexa, open lancens lindy”
”Alexa, lancens lindy”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lancens lindy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
alexa skill lancens lindy is smart,you can use it to control light .
Please use lancens account to oauth alexa skill!
1.you can say 'Alexa, open lancens lindy', then say 'Turn on my home recording'.
2.you can say 'Alexa, open lancens lindy', then say 'Turn off my home recording'.
3.you can say 'Alexa, open lancens lindy', then say 'Turn on my home detection'.
4.you can say 'Alexa, open lancens lindy', then say 'Turn off my home detection'.
5.you can say 'Alexa, open lancens lindy', then say 'bye bye'.
